com.qtplaf.library.util.file

Class FileScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.task.TaskRunner
      • com.qtplaf.library.util.file.FileScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Task, java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileScanner
extends TaskRunner
    A FileScanner scans the source directory and optionally its sub-directories, notifying each file or directory found. It is implemented as a task to allow it to be executed in a separated thread with all the control options of a task.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • isIndeterminate

        public boolean isIndeterminate()
        Returns a boolean indicating if the task is indeterminate, that is, the task can not count its number of steps. A file scanner that only notifies files is by definition indeterminate.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if the task is indeterminate.

      • isPauseSupported

        public boolean isPauseSupported()
        Returns a boolean indicating whether the task will support the pause/resume requests.
        Returns:
        A boolean.
